meanings.definition: Grummest (adjective): superlative form of grum, meaning sulky or surly
meanings.sent1: After losing the game, Tim wore his grummest expression.
meanings.sent2: She always looks grummest when she has to do chores.
meanings.sent3: Even the cat seemed grummest when it saw the rain outside.
meanings.sent4: The storm clouds gathered in the sky, looking grummest of all.
meanings.sent5: His grummest mood was like a dark cloud hanging over the room.

meanings.definition: Grummest (adverb): in a sulky or surly manner
meanings.sent1: She stomped grummest out of the room after the argument.
meanings.sent2: He walked grummest away from the party, upset at the comments.
meanings.sent3: The child pouted grummest when told it was bedtime.
meanings.sent4: The old man grumbled grummest about the noisy neighbors.
meanings.sent5: The clouds moved grummest across the sky, foretelling a storm.
